import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Skeleton, { SkeletonTheme } from 'react-loading-skeleton' import RouterSingelAnime from '../Router-Singel'; function SingelAnime(props){ const [singel , setSingel] = useState([]) const [isLoading , setIsLoading ]= useState([false]) const SINGEL_API = `https://kitsu.io/api/edge/anime?filter[id]=` const readSingel = (API)=>{ setIsLoading(true) fetch(API) .then((res)=>res.json()) .then((data)=>{ setSingel((prev)=>[...data.data]) }) } useEffect(()=>{ readSingel(SINGEL_API+props.cardNumber) setTimeout(() => { setIsLoading(false) }, 1500); },[props.cardNumber]) return( !isLoading ?

{singel[0].attributes.canonicalTitle }

{singel[0].attributes.description}

{singel[0].attributes.coverImage == null ? : }
:

) } export default SingelAnime
